TextLibrary.Text: Well, well... They're sending the boss down now.
Well, well... They're sending the boss down now.
I heard you have some paying work.
I heard you have some paying work.
I do indeed. You carry this cargo to Indus III and I'll see you're well paid for your time.
I do indeed. You carry this cargo to Indus III and I'll see you're well paid for your time.
You should know better than to ask that. Now off you go! Scoot!
You should know better than to ask that. Now off you go! Scoot!
